name: Darkfense
description:
What it is?

What if you were overjoyed by your life and suddenly some dark thoughts came in? What would you do? Perhaps destroy all tearful or miserable thoughts. 

And that's what you're doing in this game. When you kill dark thoughts you're getting experience which allows you to develop yourself. Maybe add more energy or give yourself some shield? You decide what you will choose. 

Your goal is to get the best score. You score by killing enemies however be careful because if enemies attack you then you'll get some minus points.

CONTROLS

A/D or Left/Right Arrows    -->    Rotate

Space or LMB    -->    Shoot

S or Down Arrow     -->    Use Power Up

I    -->    Statistics
